featured.text: taking time to understand and respect each other, we become demanding, resentful, judgmental, and intolerant. __(36)__, our relationships are filled with unnecessary disagreements and conflicts.

definition.zh_def: 對他人或情況進行評價或批評的，通常帶有負面色彩的。
definition.en_def: Having or displaying an excessively critical point of view.
definition.example: She was often judgmental about people's choices, which made her friends uncomfortable.
